name: Blip (Chikin_Bukit)
description:
I tried to make a game within five hours and this was the result.

Enemies continuously spawn on the right and left sides, and if they touch you, you die. You can stop this from happening by placing down lightning rods that kill the enemies, but the enemies destroy the lightning rods when they die, and you can only have three lightning rods up at once. Good luck!

CONTROLS

D/S/GamepadLeftStick: Left/Right

W/Space/GamepadBottomButton: Jump

E/GamepadLeftButton: Place Lightning Rod

ESC: Exit
